towers

Interface TowerInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrowTower, CannonTower, IceTower, MagicTower, TowerBase

    public interface TowerInterface
    This the interface of Tower. It contains two method. void upgrade() void fire(CritterBase critter) Since every kind of tower can be upgrade as long as the coin is enough. And every kind of tower could attack critter if the critter satisfied some condition.
    Author:
    Xunrong Xia

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fire(CritterBase critter)
      The attack method of tower.
      void upgrade()
      in the upgrade method, some attributes's values of a tower may be increased.

    • Method Detail

      • upgrade

        void upgrade()
        in the upgrade method, some attributes's values of a tower may be increased.

      • fire

        void fire(CritterBase critter)
        The attack method of tower.
        Parameters:
        critter - The critter which should be check if it is the attack target of the tower.
